aiInbox.title: AI Inbox
aiInbox.description: Review and approve incoming messages before tasks are created.
aiInbox.pendingMessagesDescription: Messages requiring manual review before task creation.
aiInbox.queueDescription: Review messages by status, channel, and confidence.
aiInbox.howItWorksStep1: Incoming messages from Email/Telegram/Viber are analyzed automatically by AI.
aiInbox.howItWorksStep2: Messages with low confidence or needsTriage=true appear here.
aiInbox.howItWorksStep3: Approve creates a CRM task (idempotent â€” a second click won't create another task).
aiInbox.howItWorksStep4: Reject archives the message without creating a task.
aiInbox.howItWorksStep5: An audit trail records all actions for compliance.
aiInbox.mockActionBlocked: This is mock data. Action is disabled.

empty.title: No messages
empty.description: No messages match the current filters.

link.title: Link Sold Units to Customers
link.description: This tool links units with status 'sold' to their corresponding customers, based on the soldTo field containing a contact ID.
link.step1: Finds all units with status 'sold' that don't have a soldTo field
link.step2: Collects all available customers from the contacts database
link.step3: Automatically links sold units to existing customers
link.step4: After linking, customers will appear in the 'Project Customers' tab
link.warning: This function makes real changes to the database. Make sure you have a backup before proceeding.

claimsRepair.title: Claims Repair - Super Admin Only
claimsRepair.description: Set custom claims for users with missing companyId or globalRole.

help.title: How to Use
help.step1: Get the user's Firebase UID from Firebase Console
help.step2: Enter their email address for verification
help.step6: The user must logout/login to refresh their token

security.title: Security Features
security.feature1: NO token exposure - uses authenticated session

notice.title: Notice
notice.body: The refreshToken() affects only YOUR (super_admin) session. The affected user must logout/login separately to load the new claims.

operatorInbox.title: Operator Inbox
operatorInbox.description: Review and approve AI pipeline proposals before execution.
operatorInbox.confirmApprove: Are you sure you want to approve this proposal? The suggested actions will be executed.
operatorInbox.confirmReject: Are you sure you want to reject this proposal? The message will not be processed automatically.

empty.title: No proposals awaiting review
empty.description: All pipeline items have been processed or auto-approved.
